医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
生命早期的高饮食质量与降低 IBD 风险相关《肠道》杂志在线发表的一项大型长期研究表明，一岁时的高质量饮食可能会抑制随后患炎症性肠病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/High-diet-quality-in-early-life-linked-with-reduced-risk-of-IBD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/High-diet-quality-in-early-life-linked-with-reduced-risk-of-IBD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f479674-b699-4c8c-8039-156b2aff5944 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 08:06:18 -0500 High diet quality in early life associated with reduced risk of IBD
基于人工智能的个性化癌症医学应用和相关监管挑战：概述个性化疗法可以改善未来许多疾病的治疗。近年来，癌症医学尤其取得了重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/AI-based-applications-for-personalized-cancer-medicine-and-lated-regulatory-challenges-An-overview.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/AI-based-applications-for-personalized-cancer-medicine-and-lated-regulatory-challenges-An-overview.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=322f4d14-f857-4454-beb0-f5ce0113ad81 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 07:58:16 -0500 AI-based applications for personalized cancer medicine and related regulatory challenges: An overview
新举措旨在改变医疗机构中阿尔茨海默病的诊断和治疗方式AD-RIDDLE 联盟的成员今天宣布，他们将启动一项新计划，旨在弥合阿尔茨海默病研究、实施科学和精准医学之间的差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/New-initiative-aims-to-transform-how-Alzheimers-disease-is-diagnosed-treatment-across-healthcare-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/New-initiative-aims-to-transform-how-Alzheimers-disease-is-diagnosed-treatment-across-healthcare-settings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82fea59b-6bc1-45e9-a28b-a448c25d7f62 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 07:40:01 -0500 New initiative aims to transform how Alzheimer's disease is diagnosed, treated across healthcare settings
联邦贸易委员会正在攻击制药商的“专利丛林”美国联邦贸易委员会对 100 多项药品专利的有效性提出了质疑，重点关注用于输送药物的设备，例如吸入器和自动注射器，以增加竞争并可能降低部分价格。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/The-FTC-is-attacking-drugmakerse28099-e28098patent-thicketse28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/The-FTC-is-attacking-drugmakerse28099-e28098patent-thicketse28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5bf6fcf-0606-4645-a619-58a1acea581e Wed, 31 Jan 2024 06:55:30 -0500 The FTC is attacking drugmakers’ ‘patent thickets’
氯胺酮治疗心理健康对于医生和患者来说是“狂野的西部” 2022 年底，莎拉·古蒂拉 (Sarah Gutilla) 的难治性抑郁症变得非常严重，她正在积极考虑自杀。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Ketamine-therapy-for-mental-health-a-e28098wild-Weste28099-for-doctors-and-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Ketamine-therapy-for-mental-health-a-e28098wild-Weste28099-for-doctors-and-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4a15b27-db8e-476e-8498-1db8cb01479d Wed, 31 Jan 2024 06:53:52 -0500 Ketamine therapy for mental health a ‘wild West’ for doctors and patients
年轻女性乳腺癌发病率是否更高？研究人员评估了 20 至 49 岁年轻女性的乳腺癌发病率。他们根据诊断时的年龄、肿瘤分期、雌激素和孕激素受体状态以及种族和民族来评估发病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Are-younger-women-experiencing-a-higher-incidence-of-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Are-younger-women-experiencing-a-higher-incidence-of-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf773cfb-96c8-4f50-a9ee-7d18a3341c9d Wed, 31 Jan 2024 06:51:00 -0500 Are younger women experiencing a higher incidence of breast cancer?
新研究建议每日补充 2000 IU 维生素 D每天补充 2000 国际单位 (IU) 维生素 D 的证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/New-study-recommends-2000-IU-daily-vitamin-D-supplementation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/New-study-recommends-2000-IU-daily-vitamin-D-supplementation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=309cb7a1-eee4-493f-9b19-9075fc1191d5 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 06:44:00 -0500 New study recommends 2000 IU daily vitamin D supplementation
研究揭示肥胖相关代谢功能障碍背后的关键机制研究人员发现，喂食高脂肪饮食（HFD）会导致小鼠白色脂肪细胞线粒体功能障碍和碎片化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Study-reveals-key-mechanism-behind-obesity-lated-metabolic-dysfunction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Study-reveals-key-mechanism-behind-obesity-lated-metabolic-dysfunction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f692ce1d-e61b-4f1c-bb5a-830eb72b16d8 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 06:31:00 -0500 Study reveals key mechanism behind obesity-related metabolic dysfunction
研究探讨肠道微生物群在代谢综合征和睡眠障碍中的中介作用研究人员描述了代谢综合征（MetS）和睡眠障碍常见的肠道微生物群和代谢改变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Study-explores-the-mediatory-role-of-gut-microbiota-in-metabolic-syndrome-and-sleep-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Study-explores-the-mediatory-role-of-gut-microbiota-in-metabolic-syndrome-and-sleep-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bf38cbc-3e91-49f8-9719-c338184a3550 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 05:59:00 -0500 Study explores the mediatory role of gut microbiota in metabolic syndrome and sleep disorders
研究发现医疗小丑可以提高儿童的睡眠质量并减少住院时间研究人员评估了医疗小丑干预对儿科患者睡眠质量和住院时间的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Medical-clowns-boost-sleep-quality-and-reduce-hospital-stay-for-children-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Medical-clowns-boost-sleep-quality-and-reduce-hospital-stay-for-children-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=256494b2-af6c-4e1b-9b4f-9248ef7b6e4b Wed, 31 Jan 2024 05:52:00 -0500 Medical clowns boost sleep quality and reduce hospital stay for children, study finds
